trans-unit.resname: F14·8 | Bile Blight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物及所有与其同名的其他生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: F14·9 | Banishing Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: F14·10 | Fanatic of Xenagos | Card Name
F14·10 | Fanatic of Xenagos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
F14·10 | Fanatic of Xenagos | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Tribute 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 致敬1（于此生物进战场时，选择一位对手，他可以在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: F14·10 | Fanatic of Xenagos | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若未支付其致敬费用，则它得+1/+1且获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: F14·11 | Brain Maggot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手展示其手牌且你选择其中一张非地牌。放逐该牌，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: F14·12 | Stoke the Flames | Card Name
F14·12 | Stoke the Flames | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: F14·12 | Stoke the Flames | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成4点伤害。
